meanings.definition: A small, usually ring-shaped cake of sweetened dough.
meanings.sent1: I ate a delicious doughnut for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dozen doughnuts for the office party.
meanings.sent3: The doughnut was so sweet, it made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a sugary doughnut.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked doughnuts filled the bakery.

meanings.definition: A piece of sweet, fried dough.
meanings.sent1: The doughnut was crispy on the outside and soft inside.
meanings.sent2: He savored every bite of the warm doughnut.
meanings.sent3: She juggled the hot doughnut to cool it down before eating.
meanings.sent4: The doughnut was a golden treasure in the bakery display.
meanings.sent5: The children's faces lit up when they saw the sugary doughnut.
